category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_allow_checked_out_targets
preference.preference_description: Enables the workflow handler to attach checked-out objects as targets. This is currently supported for the "EPM-attach-related-objects" handler. Valid Values: * true: Enables adding checked-out targets as attachments. * false: Disables adding checked-out targets as attachments.
